items.title: Tips & Tricks You Need to Know
Swipe Down in Mid-Air to Perform a “Super Slam”
Hit the Raccoons, Even the Big Ones

content1.text: Tom Hero Dash Tips & Tricks You Need to Know
Talking Tom and his gang of cutesy critters are back for another mobile adventure!.

This time, you’ll need to save Talking Tom’s world from a group of nasty raccoons who are out to cause trouble. Talking Tom Hero Dash lets you take control of Tom, Hank, Ginger, Ben and Angela in a new infinite runner that taps into their superhero abilities. There’s a ton of cool maneuvers to pull off, plenty of collectibles to nab, and heroic feats to fulfill during your time spent as an anthropomorphic superhero. Thanks to the Talking Tom handlers at Outfit7, we have a tips guide full of useful advice for would-be superheroes!.
Here are the top 10 tips, tricks, and cheats you need to know for Talking Tom Hero Dash:

content2.text: Swipe Down in Mid-Air to Perform a “Super Slam”
Swipe Down in Mid-Air to Perform a “Super Slam”

The tutorial in Talking Tom Hero Dash gives you the fundamentals , but there’s one powerful move that you simply actually get to get for yourself (or by us telling you right now). Try jumping then swiping down before you land. You’ll perform an excellent Slam, which can hit the raccoons ahead of you altogether three lanes.
In Talking Tom Hero Dash, The Rakoonz are back, and this time, they’re on a mission to destroy the world. Tom’s ready to step into his hero suit, activate his super powers and start saving the day.

content3.text: Side-swiping in mid-air is a tricky but important skill to learn in the game.

There are some sections where you need to do it in order to survive – if you’re not used to doing it, you’re likely to fumble it. So we suggest practicing mid-air side-swiping at more low-pressure moments. Like if you’re running on top of a bus and there’s another bus approaching in a different lane, jump sideways to get to the next bus. Once you get used to doing it, those rooftop sections will get much easier.

content4.text: Hit the Raccoons, Even the Big Ones.

they could be armed with all kinds of weapons, from jackhammers to bathroom plungers, but the raccoons can’t actually hurt you. In fact, once you run into them, you only slap them out of the way, putting an abrupt end to their riotous mischief. and therefore the more raccoons you hit, the more Super Chests you’ll get. you'll even hit the large raccoons that you’ll meet afterward , but you’ll got to hit them twice, or 3 times if they’re wearing armor.

Let the battle commence! It’s Talking Tom vs. the desert boss. Who do you think is going to win in this standoff between the forces of good and evil?

It all depends on the player! Watch and see how a pro does it in this epic extended gameplay. After all, only ONE in 20 players makes it this far. This is a SUPER showdown and it’s about to begin in 3… 2… 1!
